features: Upgrade Long Handle Broom and Dustpan Set For Home: Dustpan with 52" long handle broom combo set allows you to stand upright for comfortable cleaning.

Large Area and Efficient Cleaning: The indoor broom and dustpan set is made of 4 layers high quality/soft and heavy duty bristles, which can effectively and deeply grab dust and dirt, save your precious time.

Saving Space: Standing dustpan lock in open position for easy emptying, can easily dispose of dustpan's contents into the garbage, compact broom dustpan set design lets you hang broom and dustpan together on the wall or put it in the gap of the refrigerator, cabinet, or washing machine. It is very concealed, beautiful and space-saving!

Dustpan Teeth: The kitchen broom with dustpan combo set built in comb teeth for easy to scrape off the hair and rubbish of the broom silk into dustpan, no need to drag by hand, easy to clean human hair/pet hair and dust on the broom.
Flexible Rubber Dustpan's Lip: The dustpan and broom set has flexible rubber lip which conforms to clean all garbage and debris into dustpan, not swept underneath it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to assemble, sturdy and gets the job done. It's very easy to store after every use and takes up very little space. My only complaint is that it does not fly. Maybe the next version will. Fingers crossed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had previously purchased a lightweight broom with an upright dustpan with teeth from Temu. I loved it, but I immediately realized that it probably wouldn’t last too long. It was flimsy, but I still loved it. After a few months, the inevitable happened - it broke. So, I started looking for a replacement. My requirements: a small broom head, a standup dustpan, teeth on the dustpan for self cleaning, but MOST IMPORTANTLY, it had to be lightweight yet sturdy. THIS broom is exactly what I’ve been searching for. I’ve only had it a few weeks, but I could tell immediately that it was much sturdier than my previous Temu purchase. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice broom overall, but dust pan could be a little larger
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this broom and dust pan to replace a broom in our kitchen. This broom assembles easily, as does the dust pan. The broom itself is lightweight and sweeps the floor quite nicely. We have five cats, and cat litter gets on our kitchen floor frequently. This broom does a good job of sweeping it up. I like how the dustpan locks in the open position, making it easier to sweep debris into the dust pan. The only real negative about this broom is that it is somewhat difficult to replace it inside the dust pan for storage. The edges of the broom get caught on the opening of the dust pan. It’s an annoyance but not a dealbreaker. This problem could be fixed with a slightly larger dust pan.Overall, I like this broom and dust pan. It will take some getting used to, but once I get a custom to it, I think it will work out nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Broom for making cleanup easy!
reviews.reviewText: We really enjoy not having to lean over to gather what was swept up and this broom is perfect it is sturdy and holds up the shape well on the bristles! the silicone on the tip of the dust pan ensures the dust will not go under the pan making cleanup easy and less of a hastle! We also love how this set clicks together and stands upright making storage easy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Broom and Dustpan set
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic broom and dustpan set. It comes disassembled for compact shipping but its easy to assemble - just screw the pieced together. It comes with another piece to make it even taller, but we liked this height just fine. It comes with a clip so you can attach the broom and dustpan together as pictured. The dustpan also has "teeth" that you can bring the broom through to clean the bristles. We like the red and black color as well. Being plastic, dust does stick to the dust plan, so the occaissional clean is needed. All-in-all a great set if you're looking for one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, works well and love the comb on the dustpan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy & easy to use. It stands up nice & catches all the debris.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Five segment handle, very narrow broom
reviews.reviewText: The broom ships in a surprisingly small box, because the handle consists of FIVE separate metal pieces, plus the broom head itself.The 9" wide head is surprisingly narrow, seems like more of a toy than a full size broom. That’s why I am returning it rather than assembling it. Not at all what I wanted; I should have noticed how narrow the dustpan was and realized the broom width would be tiny.Very lightweight, but does not seem terribly sturdy.

I can't belive I'm excited over a broom. I love it. Sturdy and leaves no dust line behind! Broom folds up nice into the dust pan and fits nicely between the pantry and wall. The blue you see is an elastic I wound on so I can hang it without the weight of the broom pulling on the dustpan while hanging.... if anyone is wonder what the blue thing is on the handle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best Broom & dustpan combo i ever owned !
reviews.reviewText: This Broom and dustpan combo are hands down the best i have ever owned!i was little worried when item arrived in parts and you had to screw them together, but the Materials are of such good quality that once screwed together ( BY HAND ) they fit together like a glove! it was almost effortless if i am honest, and yet, it is SUPER STURDY!.I love the Clasp on back of the dust pan handle that you can connect your broom to , and then, like in photo you see, you are able to have it sit standing. which is great to have it near by for ease of use, always together and in one place. You CAN hang them too of course, they have hooks on the ends. but for me, i use daily all the time so standing in a corner out of the way is perfect.what i love about this set is that you can effortlessly take the set around from room to room and just sweep everything into the dust pan and the pan can come with you ! just have it standing as you are going around with the broom, then add what you collected from each room into the pan and move on to the next!the Comb feature which allows you to clean off all the extra dust /hair/ or whatever your broom picks up and put it right into the pan is PERFECT! saves soooo much time , and saves the life of your broom, plus no more bending over to take left over stuff out of your broom .. which if your like me, you leave untill its so built up that you almost want another broom by then .. with this set, that will never happen.. you can simply sweep dirt into pan and allow the broom to be combed through each time ... its so simple and feel so natural .this is very well made. i feel you just can not go wrong with this set. i have been using every single day since i got it, and kinda makes sweeping a joy now !- I defiantly recommend !

Hubby and I both like this broom set. I works well. We are seniors and it is nice to not have to bend over with a dustpan to pick up the dirt. The broom does a good job in sweeping up all the dirt. The price is a bit steep in our opinion, but it is a good buy!

reviews.reviewTitle: I’m very happy with this item easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Good product. Easy to assemble and use.
